actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run.

generate-basic-chart.eventDescription: Fee for generating basic charts (area, bar, column, line, pie).

generate-advanced-chart.eventDescription: Fee for generating advanced charts (radar, sankey, treemap, violin, boxplot, histogram).

generate-map-chart.eventDescription: Fee for generating map visualizations (district-map, pin-map, path-map).

generate-diagram.eventDescription: Fee for generating diagrams (flowchart, fishbone, mind-map, organization-chart, network-graph).

generate-specialty-chart.eventDescription: Fee for generating specialty visualizations (liquid, venn, word-cloud, funnel, dual-axes).
